article_title: 'Bushism is Over,' Back Trump to Save SCOTUS
article_text:

Borne out of a tongue in cheek response to a planted question on a late night talk TV show, the notion of a Donald Trump . . .

Donald Trump Thursday night joined in the call for Sen. Marco Rubio to seek reelection, but his late night tweet may be . . .

Hillary Clinton was so attached to her BlackBerry as secretary of state that she was sometimes spotted in the hallway ou . . .

article_metadata.news_keywords: laura ingraham, bushism, trump, save, SCOTUS

og.description: Conservatives at National Review and elsewhere may be mad that Donald Trump is going to be the Republican presidential nominee, but they must unite behind him for the good of conservatism, talk radio host Laura Ingraham told Fox News.
og.title: Laura Ingraham: 'Bushism is Over,' Back Trump to Save SCOTUS
